title: (x) "Stars" cool font w/ connected caps - Label Script (Ol’ 54) {Mike F}
content:
Does anyone know the name of this cool font?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122113227im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Stars-What-is-Font_5380.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Luxurious script with elaborate swashes - Scriptina {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122113227/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48943 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Handwriting scripts named after the person who inspired them - Bluemlein Script Collection {Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122113227/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48940 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cjcepsd

comments.content: That’s an old, predigital typeface called Label Script. Jonathan Smith digitized it as [Ol’ 54](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122113227/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/3629).
Thanks, that is exactly what I was looking for. I like how the font flows together and it adds a little design to each letter without having to spend time adding a lot of effects or lines.
